revision.text:
==Description==
List of all the [[Baby Pokémon]] and how to obtain them
===Chart of Baby Pokémon===
Breed the following Adult Pokémon to get the Baby Pokémon listed
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Baby !! Adult !! Unlock Location |- | Pichu || Pikachu || Johto |- | Cleffa || Clefairy || Johto |- | Igglybuff || Jigglypuff || Johto |- | Tyrogue || Hitmonlee/chan/top || Johto |- | Smoochum|| Jynx|| Johto |- | Elekid || Electabuzz || Johto |- | Magby || Magmar || Johto |- | Azurill || Marill || Hoenn |- | Wynaut || Wobbuffet || Hoenn |- | Budew || Roselia || Sinnoh |- | Happiny || Chansey || Sinnoh |- | Munchlax || Snorlax || Sinnoh |- | Chingling || Chimecho || Sinnoh |- | Phione || Manaphy || Sinnoh |}
===Trivia===
Chart was given by [[Jenny]]
[[Category:Pokémon]]
